comment: The worst online teacher maybe in the history of the world. Do not take.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--LOTS OF HOMEWORK--GRADED BY FEW THINGS

comment: Do not take her. Her course is very unorganized. It was an easy A, but she was very hard to keep up with.

This wasn't my first GEOG class but this will be my last. There were so many issues in the beginning we ended up starting late. She lives in another state so she isn't on campus to work things out with you. The learnsmart takes hours to read and the quizzes are nit-picky. Can't work ahead and on weeks when there isn't a learnsmart, there's a lab.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--LOTS OF HOMEWORK

comment: Although there were technical difficulties that were beyond the professor's control, I found it very difficult to communicate with the professor. This proved to be very problematic as the class was entirely online.

worst online professor ever. says that assignments will be up by 10AM mondays but every monday has an excuse for why she hasn't posted the material til 7pm. always has some negative thing to say about journal posts and uses persons quizzes which make you read every single sentence in the book to get the answer DO NOT TAKE HER SHE IS AWFUL & NO HELP
Very much follows the book. Very similar to high school course. Nice professor but was confusing at times with what she wanted us to do and her accent could be difficult to understand.

Boring class and kinda hard to understand her. Tests are generally straight from the textbook except for the picture recognition she puts on them, which is the hardest part of the class i think. and the labs can be kinda confusing.
Not the easiest accent to understand; her pronunciation is not always very good. She lectures pretty much straight out of the book, so if you do the reading, you'll be fine.
